name: Goblin Got a Gun
description:
This game was made for a Trijam. All the art and code was made in 3 hours.

Theme "hide or get caught" is meant here more as a threat because a little goblin named Bob got their hands on a shotgun and now they will use it to get rid of those pesky adventurers.

Don't bash your head into high flying stuff and shoot them good (they might need a few doses).

Controls:

left/right arrow to shove yourself to the side

up arrow to jump over the low flying baggage

down arrow/space/enter to use your new toy

Have fun and vote for this project <3
